Desc.eng: Van Helsing! There is something you might want to see. Urgently.
The civil war is barely over and now we have a new problem?
A strange Inkgate has opened in the Lair. We don’t know where it leads or what might come through that rift. Which qualifies as a problem, I suppose.
Prisoner Seven disappears in the Ink and then a rift opens up here? I don’t like this. I will enter this gate and find out how it could be closed down.
